data.enText: to make a statement that sth happened or that sth is true, especially as a witness in court

data.chText: 她拒绝出庭作证指控丈夫。
data.enText: She refused to testify against her husband.

data.chText: 有几名证人愿意为被告作证。
data.enText: There are several witnesses who will testify for the defence.

data.chText: 他被传唤出庭在大陪审团前作证。
data.enText: He was summoned to testify before a grand jury.

data.chText: 他作证声称凶杀案发生时自己正在剧院。
data.enText: He testified (that) he was at the theatre at the time of the murder.
to say that you believe sth is true because you have evidence of it

data.chText: 写作或拼写不好的年轻人太多了，这一点雇主都会证明。
data.enText: Too many young people are unable to write or spell well, as employers will testify.
to express your belief in God publicly

data.chText: 作为某事的证明；表明；说明
data.enText: to show or be evidence that sth is true

data.chText: 这部电影表明老百姓在战争期间的英勇行为。
data.enText: The film testifies to the courage of ordinary people during the war.

simple_means.memory_skill: testi 测试；证据 + fy 使… → 用证据证明 → 证实

ex.enText: Tests have proved that the method works.

ex.chText: 你如何证明他在考试中作弊了？
ex.enText: How can you prove that he has cheated in the exam?

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指以事实等证明某事是真实的。

ex.chText: 那家公司的账目经调查员核实过。
ex.enText: The accounts of that company were certified by the investigators.

ex.chText: 她得出示她的健康证明。
ex.enText: She had to show the paper to certify that she was in good health.

synonyms.bx: 尤指经过某种检验而证实某事正确或真实。

ex.chText: 他们需要新的证据来证实他的说法。
ex.enText: They need new evidence to confirm his story.

ex.chText: 为了证实她的猜测，她需要做一些试验。
ex.enText: To confirm her conjecture, she has to do some tests.

synonyms.bx: 指通过更多的证据确定某事是真实的。

ex.chText: 他的研究证明了睡眠质量和工作表现之间的联系。
ex.enText: His study demonstrates the link between sleep quality and work performance.

ex.chText: 你得证明自己是靠得住的。
ex.enText: You have to demonstrate that you are reliable.

synonyms.bx: 指清楚地论证或证实某事。

ex.chText: 飞涨的物价说明了通货膨胀的严重程度。
ex.enText: Skyrocketing prices testify to the depth of the inflation.

ex.chText: 随处可见的废纸、烟头说明乱扔杂物的习惯并未得到根除。
ex.enText: The waste paper and cigarette ends that can be seen everywhere testify that littering hasn't been stubbed out.

synonyms.bx: 指清楚地说明某种情况，常后接介词 to。

data.chText: 作为某事的证明；表明；说明
data.enText: to show or be evidence that sth is true

data.chText: 这部电影表明老百姓在战争期间的英勇行为。
data.enText: The film testifies to the courage of ordinary people during the war.

tr: give testimony in a court of law

example: The blood test showed that he was the father
Her behavior testified to her incompetence

value.def: When someone testifies in a court of law, they give a statement of what they saw someone do or what they know of a situation, after having promised to tell the truth.

example.ex: Several eyewitnesses testified that they saw the officers hit Miller in the face...
example.tran: 几位目击证人证明他们看见那几个警官打了米勒的脸。

example.ex: Eva testified to having seen Herndon with his gun on the stairs...
example.tran: 伊娃作证称看见过赫恩登持枪站在楼梯上。

example.ex: He hopes to have his 12-year prison term reduced by testifying against his former colleagues.
example.tran: 他希望通过出庭检举从前的同事缩短自己 12 年的刑期。

value.def: If one thing testifies to another, it supports the belief that the second thing is true.

example.ex: Recent excavations testify to the presence of cultivated inhabitants on the hill during the Arthurian period.
example.tran: 最近几次发掘证实了亚瑟王时期这座山上有农耕人口居住过。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to test, witness 测试；证据
rootsaffixes.title: test(i)

partsOfSpeech.dec: at 加强 + test 测试；证据 → 一再测试 → 证明
con 共同 + test 测试；证据 → 共同论证 → 争论
contest 竞赛；争论 + ant 表人 → 竞争者
de 去掉，取消 + test 测试；证据 → 不愿〔出面〕作证 → 憎恶
pro 在前 + test 测试；证据 → 在前面论证 → 坚决声明 → 引申为表示抗议
testi 测试；证据 + fy 使… → 用证据证明 → 证实
testi 测试；证据 + mon 提醒 + ial …的 → 供提醒的证据 → 证明书
testi 测试；证据 + mony 表结果、状态 → 证据；证词
